REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f4840 reute r f BC-TANDEM-<TNDM>-APPLIES 03-17 0042

TEXT.TITLE: TANDEM <TNDM> APPLIES FOR NYSE LISTING
TEXT.BODY: Tandem Computers Inc said it has applied for a New York Stock Exchange listing and expects to start trading there by mid-April. Tandem's stock is now traded on the NASDAQ system. Reuter
